revised_title: Thermal Driven Flows in Porous Media: Tall Cavity Analysis
tldr: The authors study thermally driven flows in tall rectangular cavities filled with a fluid-saturated porous medium. They analyze the flow structure, focusing on the large aspect ratio limit where nonlinear convective flow occurs near each end of the cavity. The study provides predictions of heat transfer across the cavity and compares them with the results of full numerical simulations.
